Type%20Definitions.html#/c:MSACCrashes.h.name: MSACUserConfirmationHandler
Type%20Definitions.html#/c:MSACCrashes.h.abstract: Custom block that handles the alert that prompts the user whether crash reports need to be processed or not.

Protocols/MSACCrashHandlerSetupDelegate..name: -willSetUpCrashHandlers
Protocols/MSACCrashHandlerSetupDelegate..abstract: Callback method that will be called immediately before crash handlers are set up.

Protocols/MSACCrashHandlerSetupDelegate..name: -didSetUpCrashHandlers
Protocols/MSACCrashHandlerSetupDelegate..abstract: Callback method that will be called immediately after crash handlers are set up.

Protocols/MSACCrashHandlerSetupDelegate..name: -shouldEnableUncaughtExceptionHandler
Protocols/MSACCrashHandlerSetupDelegate..abstract: Callback method that gets a value indicating whether the SDK should enable an uncaught exception handler.

Protocols/MSACCrashHandlerSetupDelegate..name: MSACCrashHandlerSetupDelegate
Protocols/MSACCrashHandlerSetupDelegate..abstract: This is required for Wrapper SDKs that need to provide custom behavior surrounding the setup of crash handlers.

Enums/MSACUserConfirmation.html#/c:@E@MS.name: MSACUserConfirmationDontSend
Enums/MSACUserConfirmation.html#/c:@E@MS.abstract: User chose not to send the crash report.

Enums/MSACUserConfirmation.html#/c:@E@MS.name: MSACUserConfirmationSend
Enums/MSACUserConfirmation.html#/c:@E@MS.abstract: User wants the crash report to be sent.

Enums/MSACUserConfirmation.html#/c:@E@MS.name: MSACUserConfirmationAlways
Enums/MSACUserConfirmation.html#/c:@E@MS.abstract: User wants to send all error logs.

Enums/MSACErrorLogSetting.html#/c:@E@MSA.name: MSACErrorLogSettingAlwaysAsk
Enums/MSACErrorLogSetting.html#/c:@E@MSA.abstract: User is asked each time before sending error logs.

Classes/MSACWrapperCrashesHelper.html#/c.name: automaticProcessing
Classes/MSACWrapperCrashesHelper.html#/c.abstract: Enables or disables automatic crash processing. Passing NO causes SDK not to send reports immediately, even if “Always Send” is true.

Classes/MSACWrapperCrashesHelper.html#/c.name: unprocessedCrashReports
Classes/MSACWrapperCrashesHelper.html#/c.abstract: Gets a list of unprocessed crash reports. Will block until the service starts.

Classes/MSACWrapperCrashesHelper.html#/c.name: +sendCrashReportsOrAwaitUserConfirmationForFilteredIds:
Classes/MSACWrapperCrashesHelper.html#/c.abstract: Resumes processing for a given subset of the unprocessed reports.

Classes/MSACWrapperCrashesHelper.html#/c.name: +sendErrorAttachments:withIncidentIdentifier:
Classes/MSACWrapperCrashesHelper.html#/c.abstract: Sends error attachments for a particular error report.

Classes/MSACWrapperCrashesHelper.html#/c.name: +buildHandledErrorReportWithErrorID:
Classes/MSACWrapperCrashesHelper.html#/c.abstract: Get a generic error report representation for an handled exception.

Classes/MSACErrorAttachmentLog.html#/c:o.name: -initWithFilename:attachmentBinary:contentType:
Classes/MSACErrorAttachmentLog.html#/c:o.abstract: Initialize an attachment with a given filename and NSData object.

Classes/MSACErrorAttachmentLog.html#/c:o.name: -initWithFilename:attachmentText:
Classes/MSACErrorAttachmentLog.html#/c:o.abstract: Initialize an attachment with a given filename and text.

Classes/MSACServiceAbstract.html#/c:objc.name: startedFromApplication
Classes/MSACServiceAbstract.html#/c:objc.abstract: The flag indicates whether the service is started from application or not.

Classes/MSACServiceAbstract.html#/c:objc.name: -startWithChannelGroup:appSecret:transmissionTargetToken:fromApplication:
Classes/MSACServiceAbstract.html#/c:objc.abstract: Start this service with a channel group. Also sets the flag that indicates that a service has been started.

Classes/MSACServiceAbstract.html#/c:objc.name: -updateConfigurationWithAppSecret:transmissionTargetToken:
Classes/MSACServiceAbstract.html#/c:objc.abstract: Update configuration when the service requires to start again. This method should only be called if the service is started from libraries

Classes/MSACServiceAbstract.html#/c:objc.name: isAppSecretRequired
Classes/MSACServiceAbstract.html#/c:objc.abstract: The flag indicate whether the service needs the application secret or not.

Classes/MSACWrapperCrashesHelper.html.name: MSACWrapperCrashesHelper
Classes/MSACWrapperCrashesHelper.html.abstract: This general class allows wrappers to supplement the Crashes SDK with their own behavior.

Type%20Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type%20Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
